Ability: Can be toggled as the primary jet production structure (if the player have multipleairfields,RunwaysandTech Airfieldsat the same time)
infobox_data.Notes: The more airfields the player have, the faster jets are produced

article_tables.title: Stolen Tech
rows:
Stolen Tech Mind Control Jet.
Requires infiltration of Pandora Hub and Epsilon Construction Yard
Requires upgraded Pandora Hub
Has 3 ammunition

Increases firepower of mind-controlled victims by 60% for 60 seconds
